com.aspose.html.android.api

Interface TranslationApi


  • public interface TranslationApi

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      retrofit2.Call<okhttp3.ResponseBody> GetTranslateDocument(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String srcLang, java.lang.String resLang, java.lang.String storage, java.lang.String folder)
      Translate the HTML document specified by the name from default or specified storage.
      retrofit2.Call<okhttp3.ResponseBody> GetTranslateDocumentByUrl(java.lang.String srcLang, java.lang.String resLang, java.lang.String sourceUrl)
      Translate the HTML document from Web specified by its URL.

    • Method Detail

      • GetTranslateDocument

        @Headers(value="Content-Type:application/json")
 @GET(value="html/{name}/translate/{srcLang}/{resLang}")
retrofit2.Call<okhttp3.ResponseBody> GetTranslateDocument(@Path(value="name")
                                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                                                                                     @Path(value="srcLang")
                                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String srcLang,
                                                                                                                                                                     @Path(value="resLang")
                                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String resLang,
                                                                                                                                                                     @Query(value="storage")
                                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String storage,
                                                                                                                                                                     @Query(value="folder")
                                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String folder)
        Translate the HTML document specified by the name from default or specified storage. Allowed values for language pairs is en-de, en-fr, en-ru, de-en, ru-en, en-zh, zh-en.
        Parameters:
        name - Document name (required). Html file in the storage.
        srcLang - Source language (required). Allowed values is "en" (alias "eng", "english"), "de" (alias "deu", "deutsch", "german"), "fr" (alias "fra", "french"), "ru" (alias "rus", "russian"), "zh", alias ("chinese").
        resLang - Result language (required). Allowed values is "en" (alias "eng", "english"), "de" (alias "deu", "deutsch", "german"), "fr" (alias "fra", "french"), "ru" (alias "rus", "russian"), "zh", alias ("chinese").
        storage - The source document storage. (optional)
        folder - The source document folder. (optional)
        Returns:
        Call<ResponseBody>

      • GetTranslateDocumentByUrl

        @Headers(value="Content-Type:application/json")
 @GET(value="html/translate/{srcLang}/{resLang}")
retrofit2.Call<okhttp3.ResponseBody> GetTranslateDocumentByUrl(@Path(value="srcLang")
                                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String srcLang,
                                                                                                                                                                   @Path(value="resLang")
                                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String resLang,
                                                                                                                                                                   @Query(value="sourceUrl")
                                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String sourceUrl)
        Translate the HTML document from Web specified by its URL. Allowed values for language pairs is en-de, en-fr, en-ru, de-en, ru-en, en-zh, zh-en.
        Parameters:
        srcLang - Source language (required). Allowed values is "en" (alias "eng", "english"), "de" (alias "deu", "deutsch", "german"), "fr" (alias "fra", "french"), "ru" (alias "rus", "russian"), "zh", alias ("chinese").
        resLang - Result language (required). Allowed values is "en" (alias "eng", "english"), "de" (alias "deu", "deutsch", "german"), "fr" (alias "fra", "french"), "ru" (alias "rus", "russian"), "zh", alias ("chinese").
        sourceUrl - Source document URL. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<ResponseBody>
